comment: Great teacher, Wealth of real world experience, cool personality.  The book is NOT necessary.  SHOW UP FOR EACH CLASS AND YOU WILL MAKE AN A...Attendance  is  affects your grade.

Mrs. Rickman is a doll, she is very down-to-earth, knowledgable and doesn't mind sharing her real life experiences!! I really enjoyed this class and you have to come to class and take notes if you want to pass. The book was not neccessary because of vista!! I'm taking her again this semester, so highly recommended!!!
I loved this class and Mrs. Rickman was a great teacher.  U have to come 2 class, but if you do the hard, u will get the A!

fantastic teacher, take her take her.  Everything is explained and she emails you test questions to memorize.  This was the best learning experience, because she makes sure that you are learning it right. Awesome...
She is the best!! She is the easiest A ever earned. LOVE LOVE LOVE HER!!! TAKE HER
Mrs. Rickman is awesome!! She makes class so fun! the discussions are great!  she does not use the text book much but really knows her stuff.  I super recommend!!!
AWESOM TEACHER!!!I had her for working with families, interviewing skills, ethics, and social welfare policy. I would take her for every class if i could. By far my favorite teacher!!!!!
She is a great teacher. She is hyper and forgets the dates for the assignments when she changes them. The tests are very very easy. No reason not to make an A in this class!!

She is a very nice teacher! she loves what she does and gives you the answers to tests. There is no reason not to make an A in this class. Only problem is she forgets te dates for assignments! She changes the dates so much and then forgets, so make sure you keep track for yourself!

Mrs. Rickman is one of the sweetest ladies! She is truly passionate about her job and has lots of experience (which proves helpful in learning the subject). Her lectures can be hard to understand just because she jumps around alot (she is very hyper) but her tests are VERY EASY you are practically guaranteed an A. Small paper and easy project.

Easy Class. Memorizing the handouts she gives you wil give you an easy A. BUT she doesn't teach you anything. Most of what I learned from the class was from other students during discussion. If you ask her ANY in depth questions she just redirects the questions back to the class. Nice lady, not a good educational leader.

Mrs. Rickman is the bomb!  I've had her for 3 class and all of them have been great experiences.  She really nice and will help you in anyway that she can.  She is actually one on teacher who cares about you as a person.  Would recommend her to anyone.

Automatic A for everyone. Not too bright - kind of spacey. Jumps from topic to topic. Do not take if you are serious about your education unless you just want a do nothing class that requires little thought.
